hits.definition:
少

[shǎo] few, little, less, lack

[shào] young;

    少年 shàonián juvenile

并

[bìng] (F 併) combine, merge, (F 並) and, equally, truly

[bīng]

    并州 Bìng Zhōu (Taiyuan in Shanxi)

{Compare with 开 kāi open}

化

[huà] convert, melt, dissolve, digest, incinerate, (= 变化 biànhuà) change, transform

[huā] (= 花 huā) spend

却 (F 卻)

[què] however, but, yet

军 (F 軍)

[jūn] army, military, troops

产 (F 產)

[chǎn] give birth to, (= 产生 chǎnshēng) produce, (= 产品 chǎnpǐn) product

市

[shì] (= 市场 shìchǎng) market, (= 城市 chéngshì) city, town
